title: How to increase the audience size for my blogger site - Quora

response.answer_text: A couple tips to increase the audience size for your blogger site: Narrow down the theme of your blog. My blog, Suitcase & Stilettos, is a faith-based fashion, travel, beauty, and lifestyle blog.Start writing posts and don't stop!! Sometimes it can get disappointing when not a lot of people read your blog posts, but one day, when the time is right, your blog will blossom into something big.Get the word out about your blog. Tell anybody and everybody about your blog, make an Instagram for your blog (my blog Instagram: asuitcaseandstilettos), make business cards, share your blog on your Instagram.Collaborate with brands. The collaborations could be small and the brands could be small businesses. Don't expect to get a ton of followers and do collaborations with huge name brands right away. Good things take time, you need to work on writing blog posts and opportunities will come your way.Work with a PR company to get your blog out there. Some PR companies:BLOGGERS WHO BRUNCHBlogHerAM:PR New YorkBrandstyle Communications NYHope these tips help! And also remember, good things to take. Focus on writing posts and seize any brand collab opportunity that comes up (no matter how big or small the brand is) and don't expect to get a ton of followers and do collaborations with huge name brands right away - one day, when the time is right, your blog will blossom into something big.
